thumb.title: [TAS] GB スーパーマリオランド hard mode by MUGG in 12:11.88
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y_r4tguVdbw以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6596M TAS originally published on 2025-06-11 MUGG ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/MUGG) here improves on their previous "hard mode" run by 7 seconds when taking emulator differences into account. Hard mode is accessed after beating the game once and adds a lot more enemies. Minor optimizations in various levels were made, and a scrolling bug was used in Level 4-2 to move a slow-moving platform out of the way to save half a second.--------Note: This movie begins from a save state from the end of regular mode in order to access hard mode. There is no other way to access it outside of a hack. We normally do not accept movies which begin from a save state.
thumb.last_res_body: ↑×マリオ・マリオ... 早っ なんだ今の壁ジャンプ この技できるの初... 見えない床がある... 下ってどうやって... ハンバーガー浮いてる キノコは犠牲にな... このテロップの出...

tags.tag: スーパーマリオランド
